name: Vegan Pumpkin Snickerdoodles
description: These Vegan Pumpkin Snickerdoodles are packed with pumpkin pie spice, pumpkin caramel and coated in cinnamon sugar.
recipeIngredient: 1 cup Spelt flour  (or other flour for gf, use a gluten-free flour blend)
1 tsp pumpkin pie spice  (or 1/2 tsp cinnamon)
1 Tbsp or more coconut sugar or other sugar (optional)

itemListElement.text: In a bowl, mix the dry ingredients, flours, starch, salt, spices, baking powder and baking soda. Mix well.
itemListElement.name: In a bowl, mix the dry ingredients, flours, starch, salt, spices, baking powder and baking soda. Mix well.

itemListElement.text: Add the pumpkin caramel, oil and vanilla extract and mix to form a soft dough. Add a tsp or so non dairy milk if the mixture is too dry, or add a few Tbsp more flour if the mixture is sticky. Taste the dough and add a Tbsp or more sugar if needed.
itemListElement.name: Add the pumpkin caramel, oil and vanilla extract and mix to form a soft dough. Add a tsp or so non dairy milk if the mixture is too dry, or add a few Tbsp more flour if the mixture is sticky. Taste the dough and add a Tbsp or more sugar if needed.

itemListElement.text: Divide the dough into equal portions and roll them into balls. In a bowl, mix cinnamon and sugar. Roll each balls in the cinnamon sugar. Place on parchment lined sheet. Press with a fork to flatten. Chill for 10 minutes(optional)
itemListElement.name: Divide the dough into equal portions and roll them into balls. In a bowl, mix cinnamon and sugar. Roll each balls in the cinnamon sugar. Place on parchment lined sheet. Press with a fork to flatten. Chill for 10 minutes(optional)

itemListElement.text: Bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 11 to 12 minutes.
itemListElement.name: Bake at pre-heated 350 degrees F / 180ºc for 11 to 12 minutes.
